Sentencas: Direct electrochemical oxidation of hydrocarbon fuels is a current development trend of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) and finding new anode materials for this application is a key issue.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of yttrium-doped SrTiO3 anode materials

Sentencas: In this study, promising candidates, Y2O3-doped SrTiO3 perovskite compounds Sr1-1.5xYxTiO3 (x = 0.02, 0.04, 0.06, 0.08, 0.10), were synthesized by solid-state reaction.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of yttrium-doped SrTiO3 anode materials

Sentencas: The structure of the calcined powders was examined by X-ray diffraction (XRD).
Titulo: Preparation and properties of yttrium-doped SrTiO3 anode materials

Sentencas: The sinterability and high temperature conductivity were measured by the Archimedes principle and a de four-probe method, respectively.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of yttrium-doped SrTiO3 anode materials

Sentencas: The effect of sintering temperature on the electrical conductivity was studied.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of yttrium-doped SrTiO3 anode materials

Sentencas: The results indicated that the optimal sintering temperature is around 1400 degrees C. From 400 degrees C to 1000 degrees C, the conductivity decreased with increasing temperature.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of yttrium-doped SrTiO3 anode materials

Sentencas: At 800 degrees C the highest conductivity (26.8 S/cm) was observed for x = 0.08.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of yttrium-doped SrTiO3 anode materials
